message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $9,500. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $8,200 is significantly below the true value of this product.  To be fair to both of us, I can go down to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $8,500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
